info: MERN Stack application uses New York Times API to search for articles. Connects with a database for saving and removing found articles.
React App memory game consisting of 12 images which shuffle with each click. The goal is to click each image only once.
Javascript / jQuery app. The goal is to match a given number by selecting crystals each worth hidden random values.
Javascript / jQuery app. The goal is to answer a set of questions about the Wasatch Mountains before a timer runs out.
Javascript / jQuery app. Uses AJAX request to an API. Create custom topic buttons to generate a set of related gifs.
Node.JS App that uses MySQL database.  App lists items from the database and updates item info based on user selections.
